Class PeerInstanceSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.PeerInstanceSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPeerSelector

    public class PeerInstanceSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPeerSelector
    Enables the specification of one or more peers by their IApplicationDescriptor.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Detail

      • getPeers

        public java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> getPeers(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                                                    ITopologyMonitor topoMonitor)
        Get the list of reachable peers out of the ones provided to the constructor.
        Specified by:
        getPeers in interface IPeerSelector
        Parameters:
        app - the application for which the peers are being sought.
        topoMonitor - provides information about topology of peers.
        Returns:
        never null. All returned IApplicationDescriptors must be peers of the one given, and the given app must not be contained in the returned collection.
        See Also:
        com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.IPeerSelector#getPeers(com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.IApplicationDescriptor, com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.ITopologyLedger)
